participant_1.background:
I have been to Japan, and I found the culture to be very different from my own
sometimes i volunteer at an urban farm.
I'm a busy person with a lot of demands on my time.
My heart breaks when my grandchildren are sad.
I enjoy performing on stage, because it gives me a chance to express myself and connect with others.

participant_2.background:
I like spending time with my sister but I'm not always the best at keeping up with her.
My first purchase was a new teaching outfit to inspire my students to love their bodies as much as I love mine.
I enjoy learning about my grandchildren's favorite things.
I secretly watch baseball games on my phone while I water my sunflowers every morning.
i have glasses.

content.text: Not much! Just got back from a trip to Japan, it was so much fun!
Oh wow, that sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to Japan, what was it like?
It was incredible! The culture is so different from my own, I felt like I was in a whole new world. I loved the food, the people, and the scenery.
That sounds amazing! I'm so glad you had a great time.
Thanks! I'm already planning my next trip back.
That's great! I'm sure you'll have an even better time the next time you go.
So, what else do you like to do?
I like to spend time with my family and friends, I enjoy performing on stage, I like volunteering, and I love learning new things.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm sure you're very busy.
I am, but I love it! I have a lot of interests and hobbies, so I'm always finding new things to do.
That's great! I'm glad you're so happy.
